QuestData.Title: Gal'darah Must Pay
QuestData.Description: It musta been da most awful thing I ever seen. Da great Akali - slain right before my eyes. Horrible...$b$bMy job be to observe only. But dis cannot stand! Gal'darah and his followers must pay!$b$bAvenge Akali's death, mon. It be da right thing ta do.
QuestData.LogDescription: Tol'mar wants you to slay Slad'ran, Moorabi, and Gal'darah in Gundrak.
QuestData.RewardText: Ya done it?! Dey be no more?$b$bHere ya go, mon. Take dis gift for bringin' justice to da frozen wastes.
